name: Box Runners
description:
Box runners is a competitive side-scrolling racing platformer supporting up to 4 players on local multiplayer. Each player needs to have their own controller connected to the machine in order to play. Also currently for best results the game should be run in a resolution of 1920 x 1080 - soon to be fixed.

Art by: 

Michelle Lo

Programming by: 

Alex Alldred

Paul Trygub
